intro: Rondeletia rosea, commonly known as the pink rondeletia, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. The plant is characterized by its showy, pink or red tubular flowers that bloom in clusters. It typically grows as an evergreen shrub, reaching heights of up to 1.5 meters.
